name: Snowflakes (Demo)
description:
Snowflakes is a Bullet-Hell RPG, where your abilities depend on the pins you are wearing.

Walking in the street, you find a pin allowing you to read in people's mind and see what's unseen, but it doesn't really belong to you...

The game's language can be switched between English and French in the options.

The game is borderless only but it's possible to play full screen by pressing Alt + Enter, you can also move the game window by clicking on the screen.

This is only a demo, everything you will see is subject to changes.
